title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8103.13 - Town of Conklin
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8103.13 - Town of Conklin

State Regulations
(a) [Repealed]
(b) Route 7. Route 7
between CR 20 (formally CR 314) and CR 177 (formally CR 313), a distance of
4.6+- miles in the Town of Conklin. (c) Tyler Road. The eastbound and westbound
roadways of Tyler Road between Route 7 and a point 0.1 mile west of Route 7, a
distance of 0.1+- mile. (d) CR 313. CR 313 between the Conklin/Kirkwood town line and a point.01+- mile southerly
therefrom. (e) CR 173. CR 173
(Terrace Drive) between Route 7 and a point 0.2+- mile southwest of Route 7, a
distance of 0.2+- mile in the Town of Conklin. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8103.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
